title: The Reef
occurrences: I'd like to tell you a tale of a place called the Reef.
But that's the wee lad who'd one day save the Reef.
But Pike, it's safe on the Reef.
Pi! Go to the Reef! Find your Aunt Pearl!
Promise me, Pi! Promise me you'll go to the Reef!
- We'll take you to the Reef, - Pi. But I can't leave.
Just follow those stones, and they'll take you right to the Reef.
Well, Pi from Boston, welcome to the Reef.
You only come to the Reef because we're small and easy to push around
There's only one dangerous place on the Reef.
The Reef is where you'll find your destiny, honey
The Reef is a place where dreams come true.
Now Pi, the Reef is paradise,
Well, reef's too shallow for most sharks. But Troy comes around
Of course you haven't. There's no fishing on the Reef.
Welcome, to the Reef Amphitheater.
If you leave Pi alone, and promise never to come to the Reef again,
All right, I got the most beautiful girl on the Reef.
Who's got the best one on the reef?
It's the only one on the Reef, see?
You said I'd find my destiny on the Reef. Well I did.
The Reef isnt just a pretty place to sightsee, it can be your best weapon.
He promised to leave you alone and the Reef alone!
Why don't you live on the Reef with everyone else?
But nobody came, they all hid on the Reef, where it's safe.
And the Reef's the hook.

Yeah, Out of reef and out of luck, buddy.
